options.title: -d, --date=STRING
options.description: parse STRING and use it instead of current time

options.title: -d, --date=STRING
options.description: parse STRING and use it instead of current time

options.title: -h, --no-dereference
options.description: affect each symbolic link instead of any referenced file (useful only on systems that can change the timestamps of a symlink)

options.title: -h, --no-dereference
options.description: affect each symbolic link instead of any referenced file (useful only on systems that can change the timestamps of a symlink)

options.title: -r, --reference=FILE
options.description: use this file's times instead of current time

options.title: -r, --reference=FILE
options.description: use this file's times instead of current time

options.title: --time=WORD
options.description: change the specified time: WORD is access, atime, or use: equivalent to -a WORD is modify or mtime: equivalent to -m
